easy.q: I am a number one more than ten, and I fit on two hands. What am I?

medium.q: I am a word of letters three; add two, and fewer there will be. What word am I?
medium.hint: Remove two letters and you get a smaller amount.

hard.q: In a line of five boxes, two are truth-tellers, two are liars, and one changes? Each box is asked once: what can be the minimum number of truth-tellers you can guarantee to identify?
hard.hint: Consider a scenario where you need a sure count despite unknowns.
